definition: resembling glass in transparency or translucency, a glassy translucent substance that occurs in hyaline cartilage or in certain skin conditions
details:
adjective
- resembling glass in transparency or translucency
= example: resembling glass in transparency or translucency
= synonyms: hyaloid
noun
- a glassy translucent substance that occurs in hyaline cartilage or in certain skin conditions
= synonyms: hyalin
